// // import React from 'react'; // import React, { Component } from 'react'; // // import logo from './logo.svg'; // import './App.css'; // // import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; // // import Home1 from './pages/home1' // import Home from './pages/home' // // class App extends Component{ // render(){ // return ( // // ); // } // } // // export default App; import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import AppRouter from './config/router'; import 'antd/dist/antd.css'; import * as actions from './store/actions/auth'; import CustomLayout from './components/Layout'; class App extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.onTryAutoSignup(); } render() { return (
); } } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { isAuthenticated: state.token !== null } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return { onTryAutoSignup: () => dispatch(actions.authCheckState()) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(App);
